mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_ID userId, u.USERNAME, u.EMAIL, u.MOBILE, u.PASSWORD, u.STATUS, u.CREATE_TIME createTime, u.SSEX sex, u.DEPT_ID deptId, u.LAST_LOGIN_TIME lastLoginTime, u.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, u.NAME, u.POST, u.USER_EMPNO userEmpno, u.AVATAR, u.THEME, u.IS_TAB isTab, d.DEPT_NAME deptName, LISTAGG(r.ROLE_ID,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY r.ROLE_ID) AS roleId, LISTAGG(TO_CHAR(r.ROLE_NAME),',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY TO_CHAR(r.ROLE_NAME)) AS roleName FROM T_USER u LEFT JOIN T_DEPT d ON (u.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID) LEFT JOIN T_USER_ROLE ur ON (u.USER_ID = ur.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN T_ROLE r ON (r.ROLE_ID = ur.ROLE_ID) WHERE u.USERNAME = #{username} GROUP BY u.USER_ID , u.USERNAME, u.EMAIL, u.MOBILE, u.PASSWORD, u.STATUS, u.CREATE_TIME , u.SSEX , u.DEPT_ID , u.LAST_LOGIN_TIME , u.MODIFY_TIME , u.NAME, u.POST, u.USER_EMPNO , u.AVATAR, u.THEME, u.IS_TAB , d.DEPT_NAME
select USER_ID userId, DEPT_ID deptId from T_USER_DATA_PERMISSION where USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT u.USER_ID userId, u.NAME FROM T_USER u LEFT JOIN T_USER_TEAM ut ON(u.USER_ID = ut.USER_ID) WHERE ut.TEAM_ID=${teamId} GROUP BY u.USER_ID;
